msbt.message: I love looking at stylish clothes, even if I'm not sure I'd wear them.I envy anyone confident enough to wear something bold and different.

I get worried about looking silly in something that's not my style, but then I worry I'll miss out otherwise. I know that's the whole point of trying on outfits before I buy them, so I can't really explain why I worry.
, I never really feel like myself when I try on trendy outfits.I guess it's fun to step outside my comfort zone, but it's also weird. Weird funthat's shopping, for me.
I can never decide what to get, on the spot. I always want to go home and think it over first Then I worry that in the meantime, someone will buy an outfit before I'm sure that it's the one I want.
Is what you're wearing now the current style?By wearing that around, you might become a trend-setter here too.
, I didn't expect to run into you here, .Is this place well-known enough to attract customers from off-island?
I heard the tailor shop was open, so I came to check it out, .Mmmmm Can you smell that?<10_4 /> Fresh-cut fabric smells so good!
How much do you think you'll stop by the new tailor shop now that it's open, ? I'm never comfortable modeling new clothes, but I like the idea of outfits made just for me, .
I never expected to get a tailor shop of our own on It seems like such a luxury when you think back to the island starting out as a bunch of tents,
